summary: Most SafeSpace UI/UX requirements appear implemented: aurora CSS background, glassmorphism login card with terms-gated II login + guest button, decorative corner accent, BrandLogo assets usage, and a redesigned sticky white authenticated header with logout clearing React Query. One key gap is that the header navigation is not fully non-navigating due to mobile menu buttons wiring into page navigation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the header center navigation items as visual placeholders only (non-navigating): clicking them must not change the current page or route.
missing_requirements.reason: While the desktop header nav buttons appear to be non-functional (no onClick shown), the mobile Sheet menu wires buttons to `handleNavClick`, which calls `onNavigate(page)` and would change the current page/content when tapped.

hallucinated_features.description: Mobile header navigation that actually triggers in-app page navigation via `onNavigate` (functional routing behavior in header).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states header nav items must remain visual placeholders only (non-navigating).
